jabber.Ping

type
class
available in
flash, js
XEP 199 - XMPP Ping

flash,js,neko

Sends application-level pings over XML streams.
Such pings can be sent from a client to a server, from one server to another, or end-to-end.

Constructor

new(stream : Stream, ?target : String)

Instance Variables

active(default,null) : Bool

interval(default,setInterval) : Int

Ping interval in ms

stream(default,null) : Stream

target : String

Instance Methods
